name: calsum-fullstack-app
description: 食物热量与运动追踪器 - 全栈应用

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build-frontend && npm run copy-frontend-to-backend
scripts.start-dev: concurrently "npm run start-backend" "cd frontend && npm run serve"
scripts.dev: npm run install-all && concurrently "npm run start-backend" "cd frontend && npm run serve"
